descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# A Magical Pet #

**Meet Ember, Your New Best Friend** 
- She'll bring magic and mischief into your home, and take you on an adventure in her fantastical world.

[media]
 

# A Living World #
- Ember’s world is full of creatures to chase and ways to interact.

[media]

# A Friend Who's Always There #
- Ember shares your home, always there to play with, care for, or snuggle on the couch after a long day.

[media]
# Endless Ways to Play #
- You and Ember work as a team to harvest resources, banish thorny weeds, and explore the mysterious Otherlands.

[media]

# Collect, Trade, Buy  #
- Forage resources and trade them in trade for new toys and clothes to suit your Ember’s unique look and personality.

[media]


Stay: Forever Home by the creators of **Bogo** and **First Steps**

# A Magical Pet #

**Meet Ember, Your New Best Friend** 
- She'll bring magic and mischief into your home, and take you on an adventure in her fantastical world.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499623592_1242411587354095_8518052294169653959_n.mp4?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=NafSGbCOKfkQ7kNvwFScIPR&_nc_oc=Adn4IgMiggMPjGPqzSulIk_H4DyDfI4O3chHIDLA068IKjGe5OUYBHtd_zPTO_gFKW0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=FBZfsNhGoqlczefQOTSzIA&oh=00_AfpQDOkf9p7Xy5J6XrnBvXEBCjTswzUVWPphIUfH4AovHQ&oe=695FE0D0)
 

# A Living World #
- Ember’s world is full of creatures to chase and ways to interact.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491824697_1278851210611188_4094365675689352297_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=kqr7XFY_BF8Q7kNvwH_Hpdf&_nc_oc=Adnm7uqy_22kFDv24YNpFJLnanl63brOoghjsX0jf_XBU6S5ucws5A-0aJSu5YgD49A&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=FBZfsNhGoqlczefQOTSzIA&oh=00_AfqGDDSoHIqEzkWlMU4SGq7X6FpGFDx9n1D_nZqaYH1Lnw&oe=695FCA56)

# A Friend Who's Always There #
- Ember shares your home, always there to play with, care for, or snuggle on the couch after a long day.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499292426_1471237290743467_5955331649547554072_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Ad74RjCZaHIQ7kNvwHQU_JX&_nc_oc=Adm7Mv-Bniu5bmqTt7TDm0o5bZjRP8ygDa6Xn6_3f6HSsIdgQMfhTexPfNyetP_VHVE&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=FBZfsNhGoqlczefQOTSzIA&oh=00_Afqxa3SV1GN55PwcjS5o-GKpp58CdZAUOAJP8kf5l3Wjxw&oe=695FD545)
# Endless Ways to Play #
- You and Ember work as a team to harvest resources, banish thorny weeds, and explore the mysterious Otherlands.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499299164_23905805109048560_5254487432958572571_n.mp4?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=m6qzO_liKBgQ7kNvwH6F8Kv&_nc_oc=AdmWPrUuDZvneW-UAtbP4BOZjrXHpwLqVXPjhRijNTiAhkgaLlSY5R4YN1vr6PBFUPc&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=FBZfsNhGoqlczefQOTSzIA&oh=00_Afrp1taw26IMIYBG0vNu5ErnxK4veBnH1NMRbVWV_WqikA&oe=695FC7E7)

# Collect, Trade, Buy  #
- Forage resources and trade them in trade for new toys and clothes to suit your Ember’s unique look and personality.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491819854_2661665637369878_2167100156395054220_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=haBxKPew4Y4Q7kNvwEyoCZb&_nc_oc=AdkfUs8Lyn2Bu9RdQGYLhq4hhDywFufQK_iQveEaX2zdTTwTk7BI3DoybcbVEG7hSxU&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=FBZfsNhGoqlczefQOTSzIA&oh=00_AfqJ4w5n23gvQ-sYNCqTlVxyiN5Su4bJl_C2I-bHs8YWRA&oe=695FC6E9)


Stay: Forever Home by the creators of **Bogo** and **First Steps**
